backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing CRUD operations for appointments with fields for title, description, date, duration, and alarm settings. Stores appointments in a Map and provides query/update functions sorted by date.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including calendar view, appointment form, list view, alarm notifications, and dashboard with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes using warm neutrals (beige, cream, soft gray) and sage green/muted teal accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Appointment Manager application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with navigation between Dashboard, Calendar, and List views, integrating theme provider, alarm notifications, and header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDialo: Dialog component wrapping AppointmentForm for creating/editing appointments with delete confirmation alert dialog functionality.
Comprehensive form component with validation for creating/editing appointments including title, description, date/time pickers, duration selector, and alarm settings with offset configuration.
Displays a searchable, sortable list of all appointments with filtering by title/description. Clicking an appointment opens an AppointmentDialog for viewing/editing details.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders a monthly calendar grid with navigation controls, showing appointments on each date. Allows selecting dates to view appointments and clicking appointments to open details in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard view displaying statistics cards, today's appointments, and upcoming appointments for the next 7 days. Includes a button to create new appointments.
Displays two summary cards showing total appointment count and upcoming appointments count for the next 7 days.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlarmNotifications: Monitors appointments and triggers toast notifications when alarm times are reached based on appointment alarm settings. Checks every 30 seconds and tracks fired alarms to prevent duplicates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using @dfinity/auth-client. Manages authentication state, identity persistence, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on appointments including getAllAppointments, getAppointment, createAppointment, updateAppointment, and deleteAppointment with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm neutral color scheme (sage green, cream, beige, teal) for both light and dark modes, including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up the root component with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/utils/dateHelpers.ts: Utility functions for date/time operations including conversion between Time and Date types, formatting dates/times, checking if dates are the same day, generating calendar month days, and identifying today/upcoming dates.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, box shadows, and animation keyframes for accordions and other UI elements.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an appointment management application with calendar, alarm, and time management features, including existing implemented features and pending feature requests for CRUD operations and UI components.
